Newbie Guide:
May the light of the Goddess guide your path now and always!
My child, I think you have ventured out into the wide world too early for your own good. Return to your village and complete your training!
Trust me when I tell you that you will need all the strength and skill you can get to survive in such a dangerous world.
Ask for advice.
Find NPC.
Receive Blessing of Protection.
Teleport to another village.
View available Support Magic.
Ask about Newbie Shadow Weapons and Armor.
